Polygons of Regions, simplified to 5\ A spatial features sf data frame with 27 rows and 8 columns:
shlf_key

key for shelf polygon containing region

shlf_name

name for shelf polygon containing region

rgn_key

key for region polygon

rgn_name

name for region polygon

ctr_lon

centroid longitude

ctr_lat

centroid longitude

area_km2

area in square kilometers

geometry

geometry of polygon as sf::st_geometry()

BOEM Offshore Oil and Gas Planning Areas and MarineCadastre Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act ply_rgns_s05 Intersection of polygons describing the BOEM internal regions (BOEM Offshore Oil and Gas Planning Areas) clipped to the federal U.S. waters between the 200 nm Exclusive Economic Zone and 12 nm state waters (MarineCadastre Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act). Simplified to 5\ data datasets

Source: R/data.R
ply_rgns_s05.Rd

Developed by Ben Best.
